net.pandoragames.far.ui.model

Class FindForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.model.OperationForm
      • net.pandoragames.far.ui.model.FARForm
        • net.pandoragames.far.ui.model.FindForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ContentFilter, DirectoryFilter, FileFilter, FileNameFilter, FindFilter, Resetable

    public class FindForm
extends FARForm
implements FindFilter
    Combines all data necessary to launch a query.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner at 26.02.2008
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getDirectoryPattern

        public FileNamePattern getDirectoryPattern()
        Returns the directory search pattern currently set or null. The pattern is matched against every subdirectory beyond the base directory. Depending on the value of the exclude-matching-directories flag, matching directories will be excluded from search, or only files with matching ancestor directories will be included.
        Specified by:
        getDirectoryPattern in interface DirectoryFilter
        Returns:
        directory name pattern

      • setDirectoryPattern

        public void setDirectoryPattern(FileNamePattern pattern)
        Sets the directory search pattern as a regular expression. The pattern is matched against every subdirectory beyond the base directory. Depending on the value of the exclude-matching-directories flag, matching directories will be excluded from search, or only files with matching ancestor directories will be included.
        Parameters:
        directoryPattern - directory search pattern

      • isExcludeMatchingDirectories

        public boolean isExcludeMatchingDirectories()
        Returns the value of the exclude-matching-directories flag.
        Specified by:
        isExcludeMatchingDirectories in interface DirectoryFilter
        Returns:
        should directories matching the directory pattern be excluded
        See Also:
        setExcludeMatchingDirectories(boolean)

      • setExcludeMatchingDirectories

        public void setExcludeMatchingDirectories(boolean excludeMatchingDirectories)
        Control flag for the directory pattern. If this flag is set, directories matching the directory pattern will be excluded from the search. Otherwise, only files in or under a matching directory (i.e. with matching ancestor directory) will be included in the search result. If the directory pattern is not set (null), this flag has no effect.
        Parameters:
        excludeMatchingDirectories - true to exclude, false to restrict.

      • setBaseDirectory

        public void setBaseDirectory(java.io.File baseDirectory)
        Sets the base directory. The base directory is used for the construction of search and backup trees.
        This method additionally calls any registered property change listener.
        Overrides:

      • sameBaseSearch

        public boolean sameBaseSearch(FindForm otherForm)
        Returns true if the properties "baseDirectory" and "filePattern" of both FindForm instances are non null and equal, together with their respective flags. Returns false if one (of the four) properties has not the same value in both forms.

      • createPatternFilter

        public PatternFilter createPatternFilter()
        Returns a PatternFilter for this FindForm. If the currently specified file pattern is valid, the filter will accept only files that comply with this find form (ignoring any content pattern that might be specified). If the currently specified file pattern is not valid, an accept all filter will be returned.
        Specified by:
        createPatternFilter in interface FileNameFilter
        Returns:
        PatternFilter for this FindForm if file name pattern is valid, accept all filter otherwise.

      • getMaxDepth

        public int getMaxDepth()
        Returns the maximal search depth. The default is 256.
        Specified by:
        getMaxDepth in interface DirectoryFilter
        Returns:
        maximal search depth
